story:
Once upon a time, in the lush green forests of Indonesia, there lived a young boy named Adi. Adi was a brave and curious boy who loved to explore the wonders of nature that surrounded his village. 

One day, as Adi was wandering through the forest, he stumbled upon a sparkling stream that meandered through the trees. Intrigued by the sight, Adi followed the stream deeper into the forest until he came across a mysterious cave hidden behind a waterfall. Without hesitation, Adi ventured into the cave, his heart pounding with excitement.

Inside the cave, Adi found himself in a glittering chamber filled with precious stones and glowing crystals. As he marveled at the beauty around him, a gentle voice echoed through the chamber, "Welcome, young one. I am Sila, the guardian of this cave." Adi turned around to see a majestic white tiger with shimmering blue eyes standing before him.

Sila told Adi that the cave was a magical place where dreams came to life. She offered to grant Adi a wish, but only if he promised to use it for the greater good. Without hesitation, Adi wished for the health and happiness of his family, friends, and all the creatures of the forest.

As soon as Adi made his wish, the cave filled with a warm golden light, and a feeling of peace and contentment washed over him. Sila nodded approvingly and told Adi that his selfless wish had awakened the true magic within him.

With a grateful heart, Adi bid farewell to Sila and left the cave. As he made his way back through the forest, he noticed that the trees seemed greener, the birds sang sweeter, and the sun shone brighter than ever before. Adi knew that his wish had been granted, and that he would always be surrounded by love and happiness.

And so, every night before he went to sleep, Adi would remember his adventure in the magical cave and the lesson he had learned about the power of kindness and compassion. And as he drifted off into dreams, he knew that he was truly blessed to live in a world filled with wonder and enchantment.

And as you, my dear son, close your eyes and drift off into a peaceful slumber, remember that love and compassion are the greatest magic of all. Goodnight, my precious one. Sleep well and dream sweet dreams.
